variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject ID

variable.name: Affection_status_ID
variable.description: IBS or FAP or Control
variable.comment: IBS designation classified by ROME III UMSL Concept ID C0022104

variable.name: Sex
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: Age_enr_years
variable.description: Age of Participant

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of the Participant

variable.name: Sample_Collection_Location
variable.description: Site where biospecimens were collected

variable.name: Body_site
variable.description: Body site of sample collection

variable.name: Mean_Pain_A
variable.description: Mean Pain over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: MeanMax_Pain_A
variable.description: MeanMax Pain over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: #_Pain_Episodes_A
variable.description: Number of Pain Episodes over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Avg_#_Pain_Episodes_w/interference_A
variable.description: Average number of pain episodes with interference of activities over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: #_Pain_Interfer_Ratings_A
variable.description: Number of reported interference ratings over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Interfernce_episodes_rated_A
variable.description: Percent of reported interference ratings over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Mean_#_bm/day
variable.description: Mean number of bowel movements per day during 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Bowel_Movement_14_Days_A
variable.description: Total number of bowel movements over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: #_Days_No_bm
variable.description: Total number of days with NO bowel movement over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Hard_A
variable.description: Percent hard stool type over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Formed_A
variable.description: Percent formed stool type over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Mushy_A
variable.description: Percent mushy stool type over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Watery_A
variable.description: Percent diarrhea (watery) stool type over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSC_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Constipated over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSD_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Diarrhea over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSM_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Mixed over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSU_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Unsubtyped over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSC_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBS Constipated over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSD_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBS Diarrhea over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSM_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBS Mixed over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSU_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBS Unsubtyped over 14 day period (Diary A)
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: %recsucro
variable.description: Total Percent Recovery - Sucrose

variable.name: %reclactul
variable.description: Total Percent Recovery - Lactulose

variable.name: %recmann
variable.description: Total Percent Recovery - Mannitol

variable.name: %recsucral
variable.description: Total Percent Recovery - Sucralose
